queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:documents` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `date` DATE NOT NULL , `name` TEXT NOT NULL , `description` TEXT NOT NULL , `category` TEXT NOT NULL , `type` TEXT NOT NULL , `status` MEDIUMINT NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE `?:documents_availability` ( `documents_id` INT NOT NULL , `user_group` INT NOT NULL ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
